Tasks.Task Description: Continuously monitor the usage and performance of Azure Maps APIs to ensure they are operating within expected parameters. Identify and address any latency or error issues.
Regularly rotate API keys used for accessing Azure Maps to enhance security and prevent unauthorized access.
Periodically review the accuracy of map data and ensure it aligns with the latest geographic and location information.
Conduct audits of web applications that integrate Azure Maps to ensure proper configuration and adherence to best practices.
Analyze API call patterns and optimize usage to reduce costs and improve performance.
Ensure that security policies for Azure Maps are up-to-date, including access controls and data encryption settings.
Regularly back up configuration settings for Azure Maps to ensure quick recovery in case of accidental changes or failures.
Perform failover tests to verify the resiliency of Azure Maps services and ensure continuity during outages.
Keep documentation for Azure Maps integration and operations up-to-date, including API usage guides and troubleshooting procedures.
Conduct drills to prepare for potential incidents affecting Azure Maps services, ensuring the team is familiar with response protocols.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding Azure Maps performance and reliability. Implement improvements based on this feedback.
